new-renew-other-names.legend: Have you ever used any other names?
new-renew-other-names.hint: For example, you changed your name through marriage or a civil partnership

new-renew-other-name-start-date.legend: When did you start using this name?

new-renew-other-name-stop-date.legend: When did you stop using this name? (Optional)

new-renew-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
new-renew-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

new-renew-email.label: Email address
new-renew-email.hint: Where we will contact you about the outcome of your application

medical-declaration.label: I have read and agree to this medical declaration

new-renew-has-seen-doctor.legend: In the last 10 years, have you seen a doctor or received professional medical advice or treatment for any mental health-related problems?

new-renew-received-treatment.legend: Have you ever had, or received treatment for, any drug or alcohol-related health problems?

new-renew-other-firearms-licence.legend: Do you have, or have you ever had, a firearms licence?

new-renew-other-shotgun-licence.legend: Do you have, or have you ever had, a shotgun licence?

new-renew-other-refused-licence.legend: Have you ever had a shotgun or firearms licence refused or revoked?

new-renew-other-country-nationality.label: What is your other country of nationality?

new-renew-birth-place.label: Place of birth
new-renew-birth-place.hint: The village, town or city where you were born

new-renew-birth-country.label: Country of birth
new-renew-birth-country.hint: Select a country from the list

new-renew-country-nationality.label: Country of nationality
new-renew-country-nationality.hint: For multiple nationalities, enter your main country of nationality first

new-renew-more-nationalities.legend: Do you have more than one nationality?

new-renew-your-sex.hint: This is the sex that is on your passport or identity document

new-renew-your-height.label: What is your height in centimetres?

new-renew-have-criminal-record.legend: Do you have a criminal record?

new-renew-home-address-postcode.label: Postcode (optional)
new-renew-home-address-postcode.hint: Postcode is optional if your address is outside the UK

new-renew-home-address-country.label: Country of address
new-renew-home-address-country.hint: Select a country from the list
